messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Ma'am
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/31/2005 5:00:59 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Of course, I always speak with a respectful tone,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/31/2005 5:00:59 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Of
course, I always speak with a respectful tone, but still, it's a bit
added extra... the use of that word. It has to be done with real
respect though, for it to be valuable. ******************




Joylyn reminded me of a comedienne I saw years ago doing Standup on the
Comedy Channel.
"Have you ever gone into the department stores and looked around the makeup
counter? One of those women with the perfect makeup and the little black coat
comes over and askes in the super sweet voice.... "Can I help you Ma'am? What
can I do for you Ma'am? Would you like a makeover Ma'am? Ma'am, Ma'am, Ma'am,
Ma'am, Ma'am."
Do you know what Ma'am means?


BITCH

So Ren (who is the sweetest most beautiful makeup lady in the universe) think
of that the next time you get a snooty customer!

Elissa
Mystik Hill Farm
Kearneysville, WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
